titles: A sermon preached at Lincolns-Inn-Chappel, on the 31th of January, 1688 being the day appointed for a publick thanksgiving to Almighty God for having made His Highness the Prince of Orange the glorious instrument of the great deliverance of this kingdom from popery & arbitrary power / by John Tillotson ...
author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
publisher: Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., and William Rogers ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
